subject: RE: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety
body:
Good morning,
 
I checked the Deployment Tracker map and it looks like all updates were added with the exception of one.  F#015 is a duplicate of one just further to the West.  We were moving that one to private property to catch a view of I-5 southbound.  That camera location will be 89733 Armitage Road (Johnson Vegetable Farms).  I sent pictures and Google map pins to show the purposed location in a previous email.  I just wanted to make sure that was on your radar.  We have verbal permission from the property owner who said he would sign the associated form.  I can provide his name and phone number as well.

Derek
 
Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Background Investigations Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
Work Cell � 541-743-6192
 

 
From: Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, April 2, 2025 2:55 PM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com>; Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com>; David Johnson <david.johnson@flocksafety.com>
Subject: OR - Eugene PD Phase 1 + Flock Safety
 
[EXTERNAL ?]
Hi Captain & Detective,
 
Thank you all for your time today on the kick off call.
 
To recap, we are installing: 57 of our LPR cameras on a mix of existing poles, standard 12' Flock poles, and MASH test poles (ODOT locations). The majority of these fall within city and county ROWs with a handful falling ODOT ROW. Per our call, at this time we are pending the official 'yes' from ODOT.
 
Our permitting team is diligently working to secure the necessary approvals. We acknowledge that this process can be time-consuming, and we assure you that we will provide timely updates as soon as permit approvals are obtained. If you come across contacts for anyone within 



Here is also the deployment tracker link we discussed. The Deployment Tracker [link https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker ] will be your go-to resource for the latest dates/statuses for each location, and it also shows the latest statuses on your other locations that may not yet be in this phase. 
In order to use this tracker, you will need to set up your FlockOS login information. You should receive an email from hello@flocksafety.com hello@flocksafety.com  with instructions. 
 
Implementation Status
# of Devices
Notes
Planning
0
	
Permitting
57
F001-F057
Installing
0
	
In Service
0
	
For additional location information, please navigate to your Deployment Plan (link here) https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c582fb84f5a18bfa866c4d81a0a2bb69fa947c69170fc1a1d44eb6b6763d27128087a45d900051bba878beafbe3abb1f89bd 
and the Deployment Tracker [link https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker ] 
I look forward to working with you on this project!



Best,
